I visited Kastamonu province yesterday and the day before.
I am met with great enthusiasm and enthusiasm for being the first President to go to Kastamonu after 27 years. http://t.co/jkvuosoq
I thank you very much for the love they showed. http://t.co/dhpzzkph
Kastamonu became one of the great centers during the Ottoman period. As well as being one of the most martyrs in Canakkale,
He also played a very important role in the War of Independence.
Especially in the years of 1900, before the Republic, very magnificent public buildings have been built so that we can not see them in many places.
Kastamonu Governor's Office built in 1902 http://t.co/s0Dgr9jF
The identity and dignity in these buildings is unfortunately not present in today's public buildings. http://t.co/yhdh2iu to
Kastamonu University Rector's Building and back plate Kastamonu Castle http://t.co/LIFBCrnx
Historical mansions in Sheikh Shaban-i Veli Kulliyesi ... http://t.co/P9C1aARN
In terms of green and historical beauty, the province has great potential.
We are in Istanbul, Turkey, to strengthen ties and deepen the free trade agreement between both nations.
They told me there was Kastamonu in the world's second largest canyon.
Yesterday we were in Cádiz, at the XXII Ibero-American Summit, where we held the V Summit of the Pacific Alliance.
The biggest shortcoming of the province is the airport; it will be opened in the coming days. The airport will change the fate of the city.
In Belgium, we agreed to strengthen the free trade agreement with the EU, which will mean new opportunities and more and better jobs.
Another characteristic of Kastamonu is that the majority of the population lives in Istanbul.

RT @kjetilba: Here is the DN leader @jensstoltenberg recommended at # zero12 today: http://t.co/15g97E26
The main direction of our foreign policy is the settlement of the Armenian-Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh conflict.
Our position is very strong, based on international law, history, justice and our growing power.
The gap between Armenia and Azerbaijan is now huge. Year after year, Azerbaijan is getting stronger and stronger.
Armenia annually weakens and is in decline. Mass migration from Armenia to other countries is a clear proof of this.
We will continue to do our best to isolate Armenia. This policy has its consequences. We see these results.
We will expose the occupation policy of Armenia in all international organizations.
There are pro-Armenian, anti-Azerbaijani and Islamophobic forces that can not accept our achievements and digest our development.
I have said this a few times, I want to say again, our main enemy is the Armenian lobby without hesitation.
Armenia is not as important as a country.
It is actually a colonial, post office, a foreign-controlled, artificial territory created on the ancient land of Azerbaijan.
The Armenian lobby is our main enemy, and we are the main enemies for them.
Our hostility toward them stems from their hostility towards us.
Secondly, the anti-Azerbaijani center is the institutions that have suffered from Islamophobia, circles.
Unfortunately, their number is increasing. The increase in their number is also evident in the elections held in some countries
It is enough to look at the results of the elections so that it is possible to see the rise of the Islamophobia rating.
Contemporary Muslim (cont), young, dynamically developing, non-dependent, independent politician http://t.co/djVWPgx2
Their stereotypes are to show Muslims around the world as a nation and nation.
The insult of the Islamic holy ones, the purpose of provocative actions against us is exactly from (cont) http://t.co/BEq4qtlN
This is a provocative step taken by the time, to further strengthen and expand the negative opinion of Muslims around the world.
Unfortunately, uneducated shepherds are subject to these provocations and should not obey it.
We are fighting the civil way and we must prove that in the Muslim world (cont) http://t.co/LnGPhkoH
Certainly, the frames of these forces, of course, do not fit in today's Azerbaijan.
How can it be that in a short time, despite the economic and financial crisis, Azerbaijan has developed (cont) http://t.co/dnRzmzuP
There are other circles that simply do not get used to making dignity on the world map.
They learned that whether they were colonialists, metropolises, or living in that consciousness.
When he sees that he is always dignified, he does not bow to anyone, he is independent (cont) http://t.co/pH9gzAUG
Against this center, attacks and oppressions begin to happen to us.
If there are no three centers, there are five centers, we will go on our own, we will do what we know.
Because we have strong support. This is the people of Azerbaijan.
We already have a strong state - an independent Azerbaijani state. We have our precise concept, development program.
